title: Bible-Discovery
description:
The profound Bible studying is not only the professional linguists' privilege now...
Bible-Discovery software were designed for those who are not satisfied with the skimming of the Bible and they need more. Who would like to understand the Bible verses and their original messages.
The genuine treasures in the Bible are unavailable on the surface, you should dig deep to bring them up.
The software provides several innovations for the effective study of the Bible!
Using dictionaries you can understand the original message of the Bible better!
With the help of the dictionaries you can determine the additional specialized meanings of the translated words. Finding more expressive words you can get more accurate and deeper meanings.
Word Occurrence Analyzer for the Curious People!
This is an especial Bible concordance function.
Using the "Find and word analyzer" feature you can collect and organize the occurrence frequency of the words. You can spare a lot of time when you use it. You can analyze Strong numbers as well.
The cross references confirm the message of the verses in you!
This is an other especial Bible concordance function.
A benefit of the Cross Reference Systems is to show more verses related to the Word places that could be found by larger and/or smaller research work. To be confirmed the message of a verse in you, it is often enough to read through these Word places related to a verse.
The Bible-Discovery program is freeware. And you can purchase an enlarged version that is suitable for studying the Bible.
The Android Bible program offers:
- This is a feature rich off-line Bible Study Tool.
- The text can be scrolled automatically. Scrolling can be speeded up and slowed down. It needs a double click to start scrolling.
- Local menu is presented by a long-click: with it's help among others the clicked word or the Strong-number can be searched for or the dictionary can be scrolled.
- Bookmarks can be used. The bookmarks in different categories can make the verses colored differently.
- Commentary can be written for the verses.
- Notes can be written.
- Verses can be seen with a black background in night-mode.
- After the activation of the bubble-prompt, the word's dictionary-meaning and it's original meaning shades can be looked up.
- Books, chapters and verses can be selected very easily.
- It is easy to scroll to the next chapter.
- Display of Strong-numbers can be switched on.
- Cross-references, morphology and transliteration of Greek and Hebrew words can be used.
- Simple and compound expressions can also be searched for by using even brackets or wildcards.
- Dictionary is not only suitable for scrolling but also for searching.
- Type-size can be enlarged or reduced.
- Quick bookmarking features
After downloading the software more than 150 Bible translations and 40 dictionaries can help you to study the Word.
Some Bible translations:
A Conservative Version (ACV)
American King James Version (AKJV)
American Standard Version (1901) (ASV)
Bible in Basic English (1949/1964) (BBE)
Bible in Worldwide English (BWE)
Darby Bible (1889) (Darby)
Jewish Publication Society Old Testament (JPS)
King James Version (1769) with Strongs Numbers and Morphology (KJV)
The Lexham English Bible (LEB)
New American Standard Bible with Strong's Numbers (NASB+)
New English Translation - NET Bible with full notes (NET)
Revised Webster Version (1833) (RWebster)
William Tyndale Bible (1525/1530) (Tyndale)
Updated King James Version (UKJV)
Young's Literal Translation (1898) (YLT)
LBLA: La Biblia de las Américas (Spanish)
NBLH: Nueva Biblia Latinoamericana de Hoy (Spanish)
Schlachter 2000
Neue Genfer Übersetzung
La Bible Segond 21
Hungarian name of the program is "Biblia-Felfedező".
User interface languages: English, German, Hungarian, Romanian, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovakian, Chinese, French, Italian, Korean.
